name: Dimension Shifter (itch)
description:
Dimension Shifter allows the user to decide their own path to victory in a race against the clock. Move the red and green block in the 2 dimensional view to find the easiest/quickest way to victory. 

Will your memory and quick thinking allow you to set a new highscore? Let me know your best score in the comments!

Controls: WASD to Move, Shift to Sprint, Space to Jump, R to Reveal Hidden Objects l, Enter to change screen

Created for game jam 147 "Invisible".

Game created by KPG

Music by Eric Skiff and fonts from FontFabric.com
